DataElement.preferredName: Bowel Preparation Prior Surgical Procedure Occurrence Brief Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the pre-operative bowel preparation performed prior to surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Bowel Preparation Prior Surgical Procedure Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Purging and cleansing of fecal and other matter from the bowel to assure subsequent clear evaluation of the bowel or to limit complications due to accidental surgical bowel perforation._Earlier in time or order._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Purging and cleansing of fecal and other matter from the bowel to assure subsequent clear evaluation of the bowel or to limit complications due to accidental surgical bowel perforation.
